verses.verse: Does not <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H7121>call,<s%> And <S%H8394>understanding<s%> <S%H5414>lift<s%> up her <S%H6963>voice<s%>?
On <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H4791>heights<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H1004>Where<s%> the <S%H9350>paths<s%> <S%H9052>meet,<s%> she <S%H5324>takes<s%> her <S%H5324>stand;<s%>
<S%H3027>Beside<s%> the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> at the <S%H6310>opening<s%> to the <S%H7176>city,<s%> At the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> of the <S%H6607>doors,<s%> she <S%H7442>cries<s%> out:
"To you, O <S%H376>men,<s%> I <S%H7121>call,<s%> And my <S%H6963>voice<s%> is to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
"O <S%H6612>naive<s%> <S%H6612>ones,<s%> <S%H995>discern<s%> <S%H6195>prudence;<s%> And, O <S%H3684>fools,<s%> <S%H995>discern<s%> <S%H3820>wisdom.<s%>

<S%H8085>"Listen,<s%> for I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5057>noble<s%> <S%H5057>things;<s%> And the <S%H4669>opening<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> [will produce] <S%H4339>right<s%> <S%H4339>things.<s%>
"For my <S%H2441>mouth<s%> will <S%H1897>utter<s%> <S%H571>truth;<s%> And <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H561>utterances<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are in <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H6617>crooked<s%> or <S%H6141>perverted<s%> in them.
"They are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5228>straightforward<s%> to him who <S%H995>understands,<s%> And <S%H3477>right<s%> to those who <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
<S%H3947>"Take<s%> my <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and not <S%H3701>silver,<s%> And <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H4480>rather<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H977>choicest<s%> <S%H2742>gold.<s%>
"For <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H6443>jewels;<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2656>desirable<s%> <S%H2656>things<s%> can not <S%H9586>compare<s%> with her.
"I, <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> with <S%H6195>prudence,<s%> And I <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> [and] <S%H4209>discretion.<s%>

"The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is to <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H9563>evil;<s%> <S%H1344>Pride<s%> and <S%H1344>arrogance<s%> and the <S%H9563>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> And the <S%H8419>perverted<s%> <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> I <S%H8130>hate.<s%>
<S%H6098>"Counsel<s%> is mine and <S%H8454>sound<s%> <S%H8454>wisdom;<s%> I am <S%H998>understanding,<s%> <S%H1369>power<s%> is mine.
"By me <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H4427>reign,<s%> And <S%H7336>rulers<s%> <S%H2710>decree<s%> <S%H6664>justice.<s%>
"By me <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H8323>rule,<s%> and <S%H5081>nobles,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> who <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>rightly.<s%>
"I <S%H157>love<s%> those who <S%H157>love<s%> me; And those who <S%H7836>diligently<s%> <S%H7836>seek<s%> me will <S%H4672>find<s%> me.
<S%H6239>"Riches<s%> and <S%H9202>honor<s%> are with me, <S%H6276>Enduring<s%> <S%H1952>wealth<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

"My <S%H6529>fruit<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H2742>gold,<s%> even <S%H6337>pure<s%> <S%H6337>gold,<s%> And my <S%H8393>yield<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H977>choicest<s%> <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
"I <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> In the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H9350>paths<s%> of <S%H4941>justice,<s%>
To <S%H5157>endow<s%> those who <S%H157>love<s%> me with <S%H3426>wealth,<s%> That I may <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H214>treasuries.<s%>
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7069>possessed<s%> me at the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of His <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H6924>Before<s%> His <S%H4659>works<s%> of <S%H6924>old.<s%>
"From <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> I was <S%H9332>established,<s%> From the <S%H7218>beginning,<s%> from the <S%H6924>earliest<s%> <S%H6924>times<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"When <S%H369>there<s%> were <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8415>depths<s%> I was <S%H9123>brought<s%> <S%H9123>forth,<s%> When <S%H369>there<s%> were <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4599>springs<s%> <S%H3513>abounding<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%>
<S%H2962>"Before<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H2883>settled,<s%> <S%H6440>Before<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%> I was <S%H9123>brought<s%> <S%H9123>forth;<s%>
<S%H5704>While<s%> He had not yet <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H2351>fields,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> the <S%H7218>first<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H8398>world.<s%>
"When He <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> I was <S%H8033>there,<s%> When He <S%H2710>inscribed<s%> a <S%H2329>circle<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep,<s%>
When He <S%H553>made<s%> <S%H553>firm<s%> the <S%H7834>skies<s%> <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H4605><s%> When the <S%H9407>springs<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H5810>became<s%> <S%H5810>fixed,<s%>

When He <S%H7760>set<s%> for the <S%H3220>sea<s%> its <S%H2706>boundary,<s%> So that the <S%H4325>water<s%> should not <S%H5674>transgress<s%> His <S%H6310>command,<s%> When He <S%H2710>marked<s%> out the <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

Then I was <S%H681>beside<s%> Him, [as] a <S%H525>master<s%> <S%H525>workman;<s%> And I was <S%H3117>daily<s%> [His] <S%H8191>delight,<s%> <S%H7832>Rejoicing<s%> <S%H3605>always<s%> <S%H6256><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him,
<S%H7832>Rejoicing<s%> in the <S%H8398>world,<s%> His <S%H776>earth,<s%> And [having] my <S%H8191>delight<s%> in the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, [O] <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me, For <S%H835>blessed<s%> are they who <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
<S%H8085>"Heed<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%> and be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> And do not <S%H6544>neglect<s%> [it.]
<S%H835>"Blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> who <S%H8085>listens<s%> to me, <S%H8245>Watching<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> at my <S%H1817>gates,<s%> <S%H8104>Waiting<s%> at my <S%H4201>doorposts.<s%>
"For he who <S%H4672>finds<s%> me <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H9132>life,<s%> And <S%H6329>obtains<s%> <S%H7522>favor<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"But he who <S%H2398>sins<s%> against me <S%H2554>injures<s%> <S%H5315>himself;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H4194>death.<s%>"
